title: Design a Landing Gear System
description: An engineering team is designing the landing gear for a new aircraft, including the retraction mechanism and shock absorbers.

tasks.description: Calculate the required strength and stroke of the shock absorbers based on the aircraft's maximum landing weight and sink rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the required performance specs for the shock absorbers.

tasks.description: Design the retraction mechanism, ensuring it fits within the available space in the wing and fuselage when retracted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a CAD model of a retraction mechanism that meets all geometric constraints.

tasks.description: Perform a kinematic simulation of the retraction and deployment sequence to ensure there are no clashes and the sequence completes within the required time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the simulation and confirms the landing gear deploys and retracts smoothly.
